channel.title: How do i add donator zone and donator shops?
channel.description: pretty much states my question. can anyone answer?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2009, 07:58:44 pm[/size][hr]anyone please?!

item.title: How do i add donator zone and donator shops?
item.dc:creator: @blood5 blood5
item.description:
@blood5 wrote:

Here

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("dz") && playerRight >= #) { // # This The Right Num
            if (teleblock == true) {
                sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Ur name
            } else {
                teleportToX = Xpos; // put to what ur teleport thing is
                teleportToY = Ypos; // put to what ur teleport thing is
                sendMessage("You teleport to donator zone."); // Ur Message
            }
        }

Add shop in donator zone
Here What u Do For Shop
Open Autospawn.cfg put ur npcid u want for shop

spawn = npcid Xpos Ypos 0 0 0 0 0 1 Shop_name
Next open Shop.cfg
Now adding ur shop

shop = shopnum	Shopname	1	1	ItemId	Howmuchuareselling

Keep the 1s
now making come true [Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java] do ctrl+f and look for wanneshop = 2

 else if (NPCID == npcid) {
	PutNPCCoords = true;
	WanneShop = shopnum;
}

There u go Compile and run

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add donator zone and donator shops?

item.title: How do i add donator zone and donator shops?
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

Make it so when they right click an npc to open the shop, it says:

case npcid: if(playerRights = donatorrights){ openShop(shopid); } if(playerRights != donatorrights){ sendMessage("Sorry, only Donator's can use this shop."); }

Do a little editing to that depending on the source. But hopefully you get the idea??
